title: Foundation Design Program
description: This foundation design program is designed to provide a strong and balanced understanding of the fundamentals of good design, as well as the principles, techniques, and best practices that make up the bedrock of the entire industry.

title: 2D Character Design Program
description: Designed for those who took our foundation design program or who already have the fundamentals down, this program builds upon core skills to provide training in designing humans and creatures for entertainment industries.

title: 2D Environment Design Program
description: Our environment design program features courses that cover all important aspects of natural and solid-surface environment design, matte painting, and sketching narrative illustration, and composition.

title: Visual Story Telling & Development Program
description: The story telling & development program has been designed to provide a solid understanding of both the classic rules of storytelling and the methods utilized by visual creatives working across all entertainment industries.
